ARABIC: لَا يَسْمَعُونَ حَسِيسَهَا وَهُمْ فِى مَا ٱشْتَهَتْ أَنفُسُهُمْ خَٰلِدُونَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: They will not hear the slightest hint of it and they will remain there timelessly, for ever, among everything their selves desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And will not hear its hissing, and will live for ever in the midst of what their hearts desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: They shall not hear even a whisper of it, and they shall live for ever in the delights which they had desired.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: They will not even hear the slightest sound from it while enjoying the best that they can wish for in their everlasting life.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they will not hear its faintest sound; and they will forever abide in whatever their hearts desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: They shall not hear the slightest sound of it (Hell), while they abide in that which their own selves desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: They will not hear its faintest sound, and they shall abide in that which their souls long for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: they shall be, kept far from it neither shall they hear any whisper of it, and they shall dwell forever in that their souls desired;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: They will not hear the slightest sound thereof, while they abide in that which their souls desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: they will not hear the slightest sound of it, and they shall forever abide in a state of bliss, among everything their souls longed for.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: They shall not hear the least sound thereof, and in that felicity which their souls desire they shall be abiders.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: They will not hear even its faint sound and they will remain [forever] in what their souls desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Not the slightest sound will they hear of Hell: what their souls desired, in that will they dwell.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: They shall not hear the slightest sound of it (Hell), while they abide in that which their ownselves desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: neither shall they hear any of its whisper, but shall live for ever in that their souls desired.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: They will not hear its hissing, and they will forever abide in what their hearts desire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: They will not hear its sound, while they are, in that which their souls desire, abiding eternally.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [21:102] They will not hear the faintest sound from it and they will abide in what their souls desired, of bliss.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (They will not hear the slightest sound thereof, while they abide in that which their souls desire) in Paradise for eternity.
